parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended acceleration can lead to accidents, injuries, and even fatalities, as the vehicle may suddenly accelerate without warning, making it difficult or impossible to control.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly accelerates without warning
the throttle sticks or gets stuck
the engine races or revs high
the vehicle accelerates even when the accelerator pedal is not pressed
the brakes have little or no effect
the vehicle experiences extended stopping distance.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Throttle body problems can cause unintended acceleration, making it difficult or impossible to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The throttle body is faulty
the throttle sticks or gets stuck
the engine races or revs high
the vehicle accelerates even when the accelerator pedal is not pressed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Idle speed control issues can cause the engine to stall or idle erratically, which can lead to accidents or injuries, especially if the vehicle stalls while in motion.
symptoms: The vehicle idles erratically
the engine stalls at idle speeds
the idle speed is too high (2000-3000 RPM)
the vehicle experiences sudden acceleration or stalling.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Cruise control failure can cause unintended acceleration, making it difficult or impossible to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The cruise control fails
the vehicle accelerates unexpectedly
the throttle sticks or gets stuck.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the idler pulley can cause it to separate from the engine, leading to potential injury or damage from the flying pulley.
symptoms: The idler pulley separates from the engine
bearings within the idler pulley fail
pulley bolt threads back out of the housing
engine running at idle speed or slightly above.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine overheating can cause damage to the engine, potentially leading to a fire or engine failure.
symptoms: Engine overheating
coolant reservoir leaking
engine losing speed
engine catching fire.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Vehicle stalling can cause loss of control, potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: Vehicle stalling at stop signs
vehicle stalling when turning corners
intermittent stalling.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column can cause loss of steering control, making it difficult or impossible to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The steering column snaps
the steering column wobbles at the tilt joint
the steering column locks in position
the steering wheel moves up and down and side to side
popping noises are heard
and looseness is felt in the steering column.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering linkages can cause loss of steering control, making it difficult or impossible to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle has the same problems as indicated in the recall #86V159000 regarding the steering linkages
but the VIN is not included in the recall.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brakes can cause loss of stopping power, making it difficult or impossible to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Wheels lock up when braking under wet conditions
causing loss of stopping and steering.
